Description: All resistors dissipate more heat (e.g., +20% energy loss), making efficiency paramount.
Even stable power sources gain a slight instability, making basic filtering a more common requirement.
All components in the kit have a slight random deviation from their stated values (e.g., +/- 5%), forcing fine-tuning over pure calculation.
The source provides very little extra energy beyond what's needed for the optimal solution. There is almost no room for error or inefficiency.
Every component used from the kit "costs" a small amount of EU, which is deducted from the source's total output. This encourages minimalism in design.
The level forbids the use of Inductors, forcing players to find alternative, less efficient ways to solve stabilization puzzles.
Forbids the use of components of a certain type or value range (e.g., "No resistors above 500Î© allowed").
Only "Imperfect Parts" are available in the component kit, introducing unpredictability across the board.
